data.title: Find widget: Error box looks strange
data.body:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6461412/12614749/1e26f2ce-c502-11e5-99fc-dc5ee7910064.png)
- the counter label should vertically centered. Is the font smaller than in the search box?
- The red box should have the same height as the find box, or maybe instead of a box just red label instead (i.e. in Edge: 'No matches')

data.title: Salsa: "Implicit globals" leak into member completions but not global completions?
[json] Unable to load schema jsconfig.schema.json
data.body:
Testing #2218 

Not sure if this is a Salsa or a JSON problem:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047891/12614500/a8b983a4-c500-11e5-9396-947b57d6ad9f.png)

data.title: Don't know the format of jsconfig.json and VSCode doesn't help me
data.body:
Testing #2218 

When creating a new file `tsconfig.json` I usually do Ctrl+Space and choose a snippet or some default suggestion and I get a decent `tsconfig` to start with. I'd like the same for `jsconfig`

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047891/12614422/22b060f2-c500-11e5-9217-324f9bce5e37.png)

data.title: Ctrl-T feels sluggish in Salsa
data.body:
Testing #2218 

Trying in a tiny file without having opened other files or setting up a project. A gif does not really capture the slowness, but here goes:

![sluggish-ctrl-t](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047891/12614368/c2f8e260-c4ff-11e5-9ba4-fd27f4f42518.gif)

data.title: Salsa formatting honours tab vs spaces setting only sometimes?
Salsa does not warn or help when passing in wrong argument type
Salsa does not understand parameters with properties JSDoc
data.body:
Testing #2218 

Please see http://usejsdoc.org/tags-param.html#parameters-with-properties

``` javascript
/**
 * Assign the project to an employee.
 * @param {Object} employee - The employee who is responsible for the project.
 * @param {string} employee.name - The name of the employee.
 * @param {string} employee.department - The employee's department.
 */
function helloWorld(employee) {
    employee.
}
```

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5047891/12614058/d6fbb014-c4fd-11e5-9932-69ac3ecb53c3.png)

data.title: Salsa does not honour JSDoc on prototype assignments
csharp: Shift+Alt+F not honouring "editor.tabSize": 2
data.body:
v0.10.6
Executing Shift+Alt+F in a csharp file always defaults to a tab size of 4 regardless of my editor.tabSize preference.
But pressing tab in a csharp file does honour my tab size preference.

Also Shift+Alt+F works in javascript files.

data.title: Salsa does not highlight object properties across methods
Salsa does not use JSDoc all the way in type inference
Salsa does not show doc comment when I have "@returns" in it?
Salsa formatting gives overlapping edits in this case
Add activation events for javascript when running under Salsa
data.body: As a work around for https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/issues/2225 add activation events for javascript to the TypsScript extension in code.

data.title: Bottom panel shouldn't use 'x'
data.body: but some hiding indication.

data.title: Salsa type inference should find or types
Salsa unreachable code detected is not so smart
Can't debug extension host anymore
data.body:
- VSCode setup
- start vscode with scripts\code --debugBrkPluginHost=5870
- Attach to extension host

Observe: debugger is in bootstrap.js
- set a breakpoint in pluginHostProcess (the first actual code loaded)

Observe: breakpoint is never hit

data.title: Output panel: ESC does not close it
data.body: esc handling should be implemented on the panel level

data.title: Too much whitespace around horizontal pane title
data.body:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6461412/12610571/c4595c64-c4e8-11e5-86b8-802d7156202f.png)

IMO there's too much margin above the 'OUTPUT' label. Maybe the title should be vertically centered, and the header made more compact so less space is lost.

data.title: json extension ships dev node modules such as mocha and typescript that adds more than 13MB
jrieken.vscode-omnisharp ships dev dependency vscode that drags in 2.2MB of mocha etc
vscode-textmate contains out.txt file of 423KB
weak module ships with debug symbols
data.body: We should do the same tricks we do for oniguruma for the weak module (4.7MB)
